title: Nila Nee Vaanam Lyrics Pokkisham
stanzas:
Nila, nee vaanam kaatru
mazhai, en kavidhai moochu
isai, thuli thaena malara
dhisai oli pagal. (2)

sinungal sirippu mutham
mounam kanavu yekkam
megam minnal ovaiyam
chellam priyam imisai

idhil yaavume
neethaan eninum
uyir endre unai solvene
naan unnidam
uyir nee ennidam
naam enbathe inimel
mei sugam

Nila, nee vaanam kaatru
mazhai, en kavidhai moochu
isai, thuli thaena malara
dhisai oli pagal.

anbulla thirukuralae
anbulla natrinaiye
anbulla badavaa
anbulla thirudaa
anbulla  rasiga
anbulla  kirukkaa

idhil yaavume
ingu neethaan endraal
enna naan sollu sol neeye
paeranbile ondru naam
serndhida
veen vaarthaigal ini
yaen thaedida.

Nila, nee vaanam kaatru
mazhai, en kavidhai moochu
isai, thuli thaena malara
dhisai oli pagal.
